summary: Two strangers become connected by a tragedy, yet one dangerously feels that the connection goes much deeper than the other is willing to admit.
cast: Daniel Craig|Samantha Morton|Bill Weston|Jeremy McCurdie|Lee Sheward|Nick Wilkinson|Rhys Ifans|Bill Nighy|Susan Lynch|Ben Whishaw|Justin Salinger|Andrew Lincoln|Helen McCrory|Rosie Michell|Ella Doyle|Félicité Du Jeu|Alexandra Aitken|Aoife Carroll|Rory Carroll|Sophie Duncan|Susan Duncan|Anna Maxwell Martin|Corin Redgrave|Algy|Mandy Lee Berger|Anthony James Berowne|Alex Edwards|Talisa Garcia|Alana O'Neill
title: El intruso
